name: Pyr
description:
Play as a treasure hunter, traversing the unknowns of a maze to find the golden totem. But watch out, as when you find the totem, it will be up to you to rewind and retrace your steps back to the staircase you entered from. Move the rooms of the maze by opening up the menu by pressing the spacebar. Once the menu is open, press the arrow buttons with the mouse to push rooms around to allow you to continue your journey.

If you would like to view the source code, the github link is https://github.com/Aquarmity/Brackeys-2020.2-Game-Jam.

This was created in a week for the Brackeys 2020.2 Game Jam with the theme of Rewind.
